enWisdom: Moderation [in one’s expenses] is half of livelihood
The demeanour of a believer is characterized by moderation and his conduct is upright
Our way is moderation and our practice is right guidance
Let your riding mount be moderation and your goal be right guidance

Wisdom: اسْتَصْلِحْ كُلَّ نِعْمَةٍ أَنْعَمَهَا اللَّهُ [سُبْحَانَهُ‏] عَلَيْكَ وَلَا تُضِعْ نِعْمَةً مِنْ نِعَمِ اللَّهِ عِنْدَكَ
enWisdom: Seek good out of every blessing that Allah has bestowed upon you and do not waste any favour of Allah over you

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَنْعَ الْمُقْتَصِدِ أَحْسَنُ مِنْ عَطَاءِ الْمُبَذِّرِ
enWisdom: The refusal of the economizer is better than the granting of the extravagant

Wisdom: إِذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِعَبْدٍ خَيْراً أَلْهَمَهُ الِاقْتِصَادَ وَحُسْنَ التَّدْبِيرِ وَجَنَّبَهُ سُوءَ التَّدْبِيرِ وَالْإِسْرَافَ
enWisdom: When Allah wishes good for a servant, He inspires him with moderation and good management and keeps him away from mismanagement and wastefulness

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْعَدْلِ فِي الصَّدِيقِ وَالْعَدُوِّ وَالْقَصْدِ فِي الْفَقْرِ وَالْغِنَى
enWisdom: You must be just with [both] friend and foe, and moderate in [both] poverty and wealth

Wisdom: كُنْ جَوَاداً مُؤْثِراً أَوْ مُقْتَصِداً مُقَدِّراً وَإِيَّاكَ أَنْ تَكُونَ الثَّالِثَ
enWisdom: Be [either] selflessly generous or moderate in giving but do not be from the third kind [iethe misers]

Wisdom: مِنَ الْمُرُوَّةِ غَضُّ الطَّرْفِ وَمَشْيُ الْقَصْدِ
enWisdom: Lowering the gaze and walking with modesty are part of magnanimity

Wisdom: كَفَى بِالْمَرْءِ كَيْساً أَنْ يَقْتَصِدَ فِي مَآرِبِهِ وَيُجْمِلَ فِي مَطَالِبِهِ
enWisdom: It is a sufficient sagacity for a person to remain moderate in his goals and reasonable in his quests
